nodes.text: Black Sun foot soldiers were soldiers in service of Black Sun during the Clone Wars. They were stationed at the Black Sun fortress on Mustafar, where they guarded Xomit Grunseit and the Black Sun ruling council. Their leader was Ziton Moj, who was the Captain of the Guard. Their weapon of choice was a double-barreled blaster.

In 20 BBY, Darth Maul and Savage Opress, allied with the Death Watch, arrived on Mustafar in order to force the Black Sun to join them. After Xomit Grunseit and the other leaders refused to join, they were beheaded by Opress. One of the guards was also killed. Ziton Moj agreed to join forces with Maul and Pre Vizsla, thus forming the Shadow Collective.

Afterwards, they participated in the Takeover of Mandalore with the forces of the Shadow Collective, including the Pyke Syndicate, in order to overthrow the New Mandalorians, and make Vizsla the ruler of Mandalore. They attacked several locations around the city of Sundari, overwhelming the Mandalorian police, until the Death Watch arrived to stage their capture.
